features.name: Rage
features.description: Enter a rage as a Bonus Action. Gain advantage on Strength checks and saves, +2 damage with melee weapons, and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.description: While not wearing armor, AC = 10 + DEX modifier + CON modifier.

tool_proficiencies: Three musical instruments of your choice

features.name: Bardic Inspiration
features.description: As a bonus action, grant a Bardic Inspiration die (d6) to an ally. They can add it to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You are a full spellcaster using the Bard spell list. Your spellcasting ability is Charisma.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You are a full spellcaster using the Cleric spell list. Your spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

features.name: Divine Order
features.description: Choose Protector (gain Martial weapons & Heavy armor) or Thaumaturge (gain an extra cantrip and a bonus to Arcana/Religion checks).

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You are a full spellcaster using the Druid spell list. Your spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

features.name: Primal Order
features.description: Choose Magician (gain an extra cantrip and a bonus to Arcana/Nature checks) or Warden (gain Martial weapons and Medium armor).

features.name: Fighting Style
features.description: Choose a Fighting Style feat (e.g., Archery, Defense, Dueling).

features.name: Second Wind
features.description: On your turn, use a bonus action to regain 1d10 + Fighter level hit points.

tool_proficiencies: One type of Artisan's Tools or one Musical Instrument

features.name: Martial Arts
features.description: When you use the Attack action with an unarmed strike or monk weapon, you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action.

features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.description: While not wearing armor or wielding a shield, AC = 10 + DEX modifier + WIS modifier.

features.name: Lay on Hands
features.description: You have a pool of healing power that can restore 5 hit points. As an action, you can touch a creature to restore any number of hit points remaining in the pool.

features.name: Divine Sense
features.description: As an action, detect celestial, fiend, or undead within 60 feet that isn't behind total cover.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You are a half spellcaster using the Paladin spell list. Your spellcasting ability is Charisma.

features.name: Favored Foe
features.description: When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can mark it as your favored enemy. The first time each turn you hit it, deal an extra 1d4 damage.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You are a half spellcaster using the Ranger spell list. Your spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

features.name: Expertise
features.description: Choose two of your skill proficiencies. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make with them.

features.name: Sneak Attack
features.description: Once per turn, deal an extra 1d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack with a finesse or ranged weapon if you have advantage or an ally is within 5 feet.
features.conditions: Advantage or ally adjacent to target

features.name: Cunning Action
features.description: You can take a bonus action on each of your turns to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You are a full spellcaster using the Sorcerer spell list. Your spellcasting ability is Charisma.

features.name: Sorcerous Origin
features.description: Choose a subclass that defines the source of your innate magic (e.g., Draconic Sorcery).

features.name: Pact Magic
features.description: You are a unique spellcaster with a small number of powerful spell slots that recharge on a short rest. Your spellcasting ability is Charisma.

features.name: Otherworldly Patron
features.description: Choose a being that grants you your powers (e.g., The Fiend).

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You are a full spellcaster using the Wizard spell list. You learn spells from a spellbook. Your spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

features.name: Arcane Recovery
features.description: Once per day during a short rest, you can recover expended spell slots with a total level equal to or less than half your wizard level (rounded up).
